name: Tier 3 Melee Critical Hits (Levels 9-12)
description: Critical hit effects for melee attacks at Tier 3 (Levels 9-12). Effects are powerful for experienced adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Crushing Blow - Your devastating strike sends the target sprawling and shakes them. They are prone and stunned until the end of your next turn.
Deep Wound - Your strike opens a terrible wound. Target takes 2d6 damage at the start of each turn until healed.
Limb Strike - Your blow cripples a limb. Target's speed is halved until healed, or they have disadvantage on attacks if an arm.
Armor Damaged - Your attack damages their armor. -2 AC until repaired by a skilled smith.
Disemboweling Strike - Your blade tears through vital organs. Target must make DC 15 Con save or be incapacitated for 1 round.
Brutal Devastation - Your mighty strike deals an additional 3d6 damage.
Near-Fatal Blow - Your strike nearly kills the target. If they have fewer than 20 HP, they must make DC 18 Con save or drop to 0 HP.

dorman-lakelys-crit-fumble-tables.failEffect: Drop to 0 HP if under 20 HP
